data.quote: There is some good in this world, and it’s worth fighting for.
data.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

data.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do.
data.author: H.Jackson Brown Jr.

data.quote: Well-behaved women seldom make history.
data.author: Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

data.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
data.author: André Gide

data.quote: Who, being loved, is poor?
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving.
data.author: J.K. Rowling

data.quote: Get busy living, or get busy dying.
data.author: Stephen King

data.quote: The goal isn’t to live forever, the goal is to create something that will.
data.author: Chuck Palahniuk

data.quote: Travel far enough, you meet yourself.
data.author: David Mitchell

data.quote: None of us really changes over time. We only become more fully what we are.
data.author: Anne Rice

data.quote: Most people are nice when you finally see them.
data.author: Harper Lee

data.quote: Don’t panic.
data.author: Douglas Adams

data.quote: All endings are also beginnings. We just don’t know it at the time.
data.author: Mitch Albom

data.quote: When someone leaves, it’s because someone else is about to arrive.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: It’s no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.
data.author: Lewis Carroll

data.quote: The only limits for tomorrow are the doubts we have today.
data.author: Pittacus Lore

data.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
data.author: J.K. Rowling

data.quote: If we wait until we’re ready, we’ll be waiting for the rest of our lives.
data.author: Lemony Snicket

data.quote: I don’t want to die without any scars.
data.author: Chuck Palahniuk

data.quote: Fear doesn’t shut you down; it wakes you up.
data.author: Veronica Roth
